item.title: Neo Berlin 2087 – Gamescom 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

New characters introduced.

Elysium Game Studio has released the Gamescom 2025 gameplay trailer for Neo Berlin 2087, its upcoming third- and first-person action RPG set in a dystopian cyberpunk world.

Neo Berlin 2087 was first announced in 2021 under the title Shadow of Conspiracy: Section 2. It resurfaced under its new name in April 2023, and received new gameplay trailers ahead of Gamescom 2023 and Gamescom 2024.

Here is a brief overview of the newest trailer, via Elysium Game Studio:

Dive into the dystopian cyberpunk world of Neo Berlin 2087—a unique third- and first-person action RPG crafted for fans of immersive single-player experiences. Uncover a deep, narrative-driven story through never-before-seen gameplay, new levels, cinematic cutscenes, and intense combat. Meet new characters Bryan and Phoenix in this action-packed Gamescom 2025 reveal.

Neo Berlin 2087 will be available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.
